column1: text
I think it is pretty good
I think I do very well
I had my stroke at night probably when I was sleeping
I think I became aware of my stroke at the breakfast table
my husband asked me some questions
and I couldn't answer him right
I went to a rehab center for one week
and then I had a speech therapist
and I am almost done with her
I think my last meeting will be next week with her
I am s trying to be a person who uses Arc which is a Aphasia Recovery Connection
and they have conversation segments
and I generally sign up for those
that's kind_of one thing I do to help me

okay
I  I can tell you about our trip to China
it was a land and tour  sea tour trip
we took an airplane from Singapore
and we flew to other hotels
the airplane flew to Tibet
and we got to see many beautiful temples
and the people were walking around the temple
and it was very beautiful
and I enjoyed going inside the temple
they had a very big Buddha there who was made all of gold
and it was an immense amount of gold
the people burned oil in the temple
and we had to inhale the smoke
the  visiting the temple was very beautiful
we saw the people doing exercises
um or not exercises
they were praying
and they prayed by moving their bodies up and down
so  I enjoyed watching them
then we walked along the street
and we went to various vendors
and we purchased a silver Buddha and a singing bowl
and that was rary
then we went to eyenother
and it was so tall
the height of the place was very tall fourteen thousand feet
and I had altitude sickness
and I had to have oxygen
and the mpee doctor gave me oxygen at night and the next day
so  I was glad to leave Tibet after that time
then I took a boat on the Yangtzi river
and it was very beautiful
the boat stopped at different cities along the way
and we saw many bridges that went across the river
and I thought that it was interesting

he doesn't need the umbrella
